info.summary:
Somak Raychaudhury works as a Senior Lecturer in Astrophysics in School of Physics and Astronomy|University of Birmingham, and his\her h-index is 30, g-index is 49. His\Her interests are :
 Galaxy Clusters; Star Formation; Cluster Of Galaxies; Galaxy Group; Low Frequency;
